description: An interactive card animation featuring 5 layered cards with glassmorphic blur effects. Cards toggle between collapsed and fanned-out states on tap, with smooth spring animations and 3D transforms. Features dynamic backdrop blur and radial gradient backgrounds rendered with Skia.
main_features: Dynamic backdrop blur effects using Skia
Multiple layered cards with staggered transforms
Glassmorphic card design with semi-transparent fills

file_structure.index.tsx: Main BlurCards component with canvas rendering and touch interaction logic

@shopify/react-native-skia.usage: GPU-accelerated rendering of animated cards with blur effects and gradients
@shopify/react-native-skia.performance_reason: Native-level performance for complex 3D transforms and blur effects

touch_interaction.behavior: Toggles between expanded (1) and collapsed (0) states
touch_interaction.effect: Cards toggle between fanned out and collapsed states on tap

transforms: rotate: Rotates cards by -90 degrees * progress
translateX: Spreads cards horizontally by 25px * index * progress
rotateY: Rotates cards in 3D space by 60 degrees * progress
rotate: Additional rotation by 45 degrees * progress

backdrop_blur.optimization: Uses Math.max to ensure non-negative blur values
backdrop_blur.effect: Blur increases smoothly as cards transform

radial_gradient.radius: Half of the smaller window dimension
radial_gradient.effect: Smooth gradient background with heavy blur
